ratings.comment: Very knowledgeable.  Open to questions.  Hard to follow along in lecture sometimes.  Exams rather difficult.

Hill focuses on stat concepts with MINIMUM calculations. This class is great for those who did poorly in 210! Only one exam which is 99% from lecture notes & 3 oral presentations.  The TA grades everything except for the final presentation which is peer-graded.He comes across as 'socially detached' but does help when you ask questions.

Took Psych 411: Child Temperament and Behavior Problems with him last semester. Interesting material, kind of an awkward lecturer though. Not very good with people. Socially awkward. Attendance mandatory because it's a small class. Only reading is APA articles, no textbook. Some videos watched. Powerpoint presentation and paper plus an exam.
